content: knitted christmas tree decoration in drops paris the piece is worked top down with garter stitch theme christmas see the santa s parade pattern here 1 drops design pattern no w-856 yarn group c or a + a size width at bottom = 8 cm length = 10 cm without loop materials drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 43 forest green + a left-over colour 17 off white for cord 1 christmas tree weighs approx 6 g needles drops straight needle size 3 5 mm knitting gauge 20 stitches and 41 row with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/0-1543-santas-parade
